categories: Heady Stripe Lightweight Cushion Micro Crew S
description: Explore further up the trail without sore feet. These socks are made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that regulates foot temperature to keep your feet warm in the cool and cool in the heat.Cushioned sole and leg provides great comfort without bulk.Ribbed performance knit ensures no slipping, no bunching or blisters.True Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
name: Darn Tough Heady Stripe Lightweight Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Men's
